summary: MobileViT is a PyTorch module that implements a lightweight vision transformer architecture optimized for mobile and edge devices. It provides configurable model sizes (xxs, xs, s), accepts variable input channel counts, and processes images using patch-based tokenization combined with convolutional layers to produce compact feature maps suitable for downstream vision tasks.
business_intent: Enable developers to integrate an efficient, high‑performance visual feature extractor into mobile, embedded, or low‑resource applications such as image classification, object detection, and segmentation, reducing computational load while maintaining accuracy.
